Detailed Description

Click here to see the header..

Define Documentation

#define BOOST_PP_LIST_REVERSE (  L    ) 
 

List reversal.

For example, 

  BOOST_PP_LIST_REVERSE(BOOST_PP_TUPLE_TO_LIST(3,(A,B,C)))

expands to a list containing C, B and A.
